data.text:
Our Family of four ( 2 adults 2 teenagers) stayed at Double Tree Hilton Al Barsha for 7 nights.We booked the King two bedroom suite with Balcony with half board ( breakfast and dinner).

Front Office:
Very friendly and professional staff at the front office did our checkin super fast. We had help to carry our bags to our room and the staff member Rajendar who helped us was very professional and courteous.

Rooms:
The two bedroom suite was fantastic. Complementary water bottles (4) were provided. Airconditioning was perfect. The staff member Rajendar who helped us with the luggage also helped to explain all the facilities available in the room( iron , do not disturb sign , configuring the temperature etc ). We really appreciated that.

Cleaning:
Cleaning staff did great job. When we did not want the room to be cleaned they respected the sign and when we wanted the room to be clean they impeccably cleaned the room and there were ample towels and toiletries and we did not have to follow up on any of the aspects. Good job guys.We even had a surprise when they made beautiful art work with the towels and arranged nicely on the bed. We are attaching the pictures.

Breakfast

Breakfast was satisfactory. Kudos to the staff members who were preparing omlettes and catered to our varied wishes in terms of how to make the omelette. Special mention goes to the staff member Naktaya and her colleague who were very friendly , smiling and patient when preparing the omlettes  to all the guests. It was not an easy job. We had chicken sausages , baked beans , some Indian varieties ( semolina/pongal, veg fried rice etc ) and couple of juices ( orange , pineapple ). There were couple of good selection of desserts ( cakes and pastries ). They also had few varieties of salad and fruits. Overall the breakfast is ok + the omlettes which was the main highlight for us ðŸ™‚. We would like to commend the staff member Ate Chann for her professionalism and  friendliness  with always a smile and helping the guests.

Dinner
We were not happy with the dinner varieties as we selected half board. There was a fish soup platter , grilled chicken pieces , pasta and rice . Sometimes the rice was hard. The desserts were very good. Overall we do not recommend half board dinner.

Special Mention
The staff members/managers   Bilbek Singh and Rajkumar deserve special mention for providing great service during breakfast  and for being very friendly and professional. They were recommending the places to visit and even arranged a special cake on our last day. That was a touching gesture.

All in all we recommend the stay in double tree Hilton Al barsha which is walkable from the mall of Emirates and we felt it was a safe area .
data.title: Great hotel very close to mall of the emirates and fantastic staff

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear valued Guest,
Thank you very much for such beautiful phrase we are truly ecstatic hearing that.  We believe that hospitality is personal and it all starts with a dedicated and caring team. Your feedback makes us proud and motivates us at the same time!Your complimentary remarks regarding your stay and our services were a delight to read. My colleagues take great pride in providing exceptional service and it is always rewarding to be able to share praises from our valuable guests. Our guestsâ€™ feedback is what helps us in meeting and exceeding our guest expectations .Thank you.
Best Regards

Ashley Fernandes
Front Office Manager
+971 4 375 0999
owner_response.author: DT Al Barsha

data.text: Was a diamond member. Was upgraded from a standard room to a 2 bedroom suite. Nice decor in front. Good location 5 minutes from the mall. The metro is inside mall. Once yo enter its about another 3 minutes. Included free breakfast which was great. Great service at buffet. Suite had a full kitchen. Grocery store a 2 minute walk. Peaceful area. Taxis were steps away. Nice hotel at a budget price.
data.title: Excellent Value

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

Thank you so much for your very kind words and we are all delighted that enjoyed your visit so much. We do try hard to make our guests feel at home, and well taken care of, so it is very rewarding to know how much our guests enjoy themselves. We hope to be able to welcome you back very soon.

Best Regards

Ashley Fernandes
Front Office Manager
owner_response.author: DT Al Barsha

data.text: Just spent 5 nights here as a base for a golf trip with friends from the UK and Australia. Itâ€™s a good location between the golf courses and the marina and creek. We all enjoyed the breakfast and the staff were all very friendly and helpful, especially in getting the larger taxis for golf bags etc. They worked hard to make our stay very enjoyable and always had a smile on their faces especially the concierge, even when we had heavy rain cancelling one of our golf days they came up with great suggestions of what else we could do.
data.title: Excellent base for golf courses

owner_response.title: Owner response

data.text: This hotel is ideal for anyone wanting to explore Dubai as it is in the centre of everything. Itâ€™s easy to get a taxi and there are plenty of shops close by including the mall of the emirates. All staff were very helpful and friendly. We had a few little issues with the hotel room but nothing major. Our room was a non-smoking room but on arrival it smelt bad of smoke in the room and corridors and when we alerted the reception staff, nothing was done about it. The breakfast was ok, nothing special but food was warm and had good variety. Our shower leaked and some of the lights didnâ€™t work in our room but nothing a little maintenance wouldnâ€™t fix. For the price we paid we couldnâ€™t complain as it is very good value for money and only a short 30 minutes drive from the main airport. I would definitely return to this hotel if I was to visit Dubai again!
data.title: Good value for money.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Ellie

We are pleased to hear that you found our overall service and facilities to your satisfaction, as this is what we always strive to achieve at all times. We take guest feedback very seriously and as comment shared on this particular occasion, your experience was well below the standards of quality and service we strive to maintain. I have discussed the matters you so kindly brought to my attention with the department heads concerned in an effort to prevent such shortfalls from recurring in the future. We hope to be able to welcome you back very soon. 

Best Regards

Ashley Fernandes
Front Office Manager
+971 4 375 0999
owner_response.author: DT Al Barsha

data.text: Absolutely wonderful staff. Comfortable and clean. Breakfast selection is good. The Bistro staff are also very accommodating. I had an issue with my room and it was resolved within minutes. The water pressure needs to be increased and the hot water quantity. Other than that a very convenient location, 5 min walk to the Mall of the Emirates.
data.title: A home away from home

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

Many thanks for your kind note and I am delighted that my team has managed to deliver such a great service, making your stay a memorable one. We are expecting to welcome you back to our hotel next time you will travel to our area.

Best Regards

Ashley Fernandes
Front Office Manager
+971 4 375 0999
